UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Systematic comparison of activity and mechanism of antimicrobial peptides against nosocomial pathogens.
Literature.Author: Lin B, Hung A, Li R, Barlow A, Singleton W, Matthyssen T, Sani MA, Hossain MA, Wade JD, O'Brien-Simpson NM, Li W

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:18% Killing=125 µg/ml,Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:38% Killing=250 µg/ml
